short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allow websites to access your locally running Ollama instance.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By installing this extension, you can let any website talk to your locally running Ollama instance.

Latest Changes:
v2:
- Simplify the usage of the API by removing the npmjs extension and allowing fetch access (each domain must still be approved by the user)
